MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object
public: property System::Object ^ SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取可用于同步对集合的访问的对象。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
The current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 程序代码通常应在执行同步的操作的一个集合，不是直接对集合本身。Program code should generally perform synchronized operations on the of a collection, not directly on the collection itself. 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体地说，这样可保持正确的同步，与可能同时对进行修改的集合对象的其他线程。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection object. 在此实现中返回的对象是本身。The object returned in this implementation is the itself. ## Examples 下面的示例创建用于对访问进行同步的对象。The following example creates an object used to synchronize access to the . [!code-csharp[Classic HttpStaticObjectsCollection.SyncRoot Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpStaticObjectsCollection.SyncRoot Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpStaticObjectsCollection.SyncRoot Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpStaticObjectsCollection.SyncRoot Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
